attributes.action: Give childcare allowance to parents returning to work after maternity leave
attributes.background:
Parents who are returning back to work after maternity leave get little or no help with childcare costs.

I’ve created this petition to ask the government to please consider helping working parents with childcare cost eg vouchers or an allowance

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you would like more support for parents returning to work but we aren't sure exactly what support you would like to be given.

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/225783

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221496

Alternatively you could start a new petition setting out clearly what help you would like given to working parents.
